name: Call of Final Battleground
description:
You must have heard about the deadly battles between two super powers, and all your childhood scary diaries revolve around and fighting enemy stories. Do you want to be a part of old times Battle Fighting? If yes then welcome to this modern version of world war 2 survival mission game. Get yourself started as a killer shooter in the snow jungles of French Triumph and win this call of final battle WW2. Show your expert shooting skills to demolish enemies in the battle field and take control of front row to fight from the front line. Kill all the rival force with your killer shooter skills and enter into the enemy base without any fear. Write your own Enemy Story in this survival mission battle field game. Rival force is not so easy to take on, you have to move swiftly and show sharp attention to any brisk movement around you. Be the sniper expert of FPS Battle.

Features:

- Kill enemy army to win the snow battle world war Last Battleground
- Sniper guns, aluminum ammo, sniper rifle, special lenses, hand grenades, russian pistol
- Become army hero of Sniper Duty WW2 Battle
- High Quality Graphics
- Sniper Expert FPS Battle Game
- Extreme Fighting army battle
- Realistic fighting sounds
- Intuitive controls, virtual gameplay
